welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gavirate, a charming city known for its breathtaking scenery and rich cultural heritage. Get ready to indulge in delicious cuisine, explore historic landmarks, and soak up the beauty of this enchanting destination. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
